scenarios.name: Simple Greeting - Easy
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Bonjour, comment allez-vous aujourd'hui ?"
scenarios.expected_output: Hello, how are you today?

scenarios.name: Restaurant Order - Easy
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Je voudrais commander un café et un morceau de gâteau, s'il vous plaît."
scenarios.expected_output: I would like to order a coffee and a piece of cake, please.

scenarios.name: Weather Description - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Les prévisions météorologiques annoncent de fortes pluies et des orages tout le week-end, nous devrions donc probablement reporter notre randonnée."
scenarios.expected_output: The weather forecast predicts heavy rainfall and thunderstorms throughout the weekend, so we should probably postpone our hiking trip.

scenarios.name: Technology Discussion - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Le dernier smartphone propose un système de caméra avancé avec des capacités d'intelligence artificielle qui peut automatiquement améliorer la qualité des photos dans diverses conditions d'éclairage."
scenarios.expected_output: The latest smartphone features an advanced camera system with artificial intelligence capabilities that can automatically enhance photo quality in various lighting conditions.

scenarios.name: Academic Text - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "L'approche interdisciplinaire du développement durable nécessite une collaboration entre les scientifiques environnementaux, les économistes et les décideurs politiques pour relever les défis complexes du changement climatique tout en maintenant la croissance économique."
scenarios.expected_output: The interdisciplinary approach to sustainable development requires collaboration between environmental scientists, economists, and policy makers to address the complex challenges of climate change while maintaining economic growth.

scenarios.name: Idiomatic Expression - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Il ne faut pas vendre la peau de l'ours avant de l'avoir tué - nous devrions attendre les résultats officiels avant de célébrer notre succès."
scenarios.expected_output: Don't count your chickens before they hatch - we should wait for the official results before celebrating our success.

scenarios.name: Medical Context - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Le patient présente des symptômes de bronchite aiguë, notamment une toux persistante, une oppression thoracique et des difficultés respiratoires, qui peuvent nécessiter une intervention médicale immédiate."
scenarios.expected_output: The patient exhibits symptoms of acute bronchitis, including persistent cough, chest tightness, and difficulty breathing, which may require immediate medical intervention.

scenarios.name: Literary Text - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Le vent d'automne mélancolique murmurait à travers les feuilles dorées, portant avec lui les souvenirs doux-amers de l'étreinte fugace de l'été, comme si la nature elle-même pleurait l'inévitable passage du temps."
scenarios.expected_output: The melancholic autumn wind whispered through the golden leaves, carrying with it the bittersweet memories of summer's fleeting embrace, as if nature itself mourned the inevitable passage of time.

scenarios.name: Business Context - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Notre rapport de ventes trimestriel indique une augmentation significative des revenus, principalement motivée par de solides performances sur les marchés européens et des lancements de produits réussis."
scenarios.expected_output: Our quarterly sales report indicates a significant increase in revenue, primarily driven by strong performance in the European markets and successful product launches.

scenarios.name: Travel Directions - Easy

scenarios.name: Emergency Situation - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: Please call an ambulance immediately! There has been a serious accident and someone needs urgent medical attention.

scenarios.name: Scientific Research - Hard

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: The hypothesis postulates that quantum entanglement phenomena could potentially revolutionize information processing capabilities in next-generation computing architectures.

scenarios.name: Cooking Instructions - Medium

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius, mix the ingredients thoroughly, and bake for approximately 25 minutes until golden brown.

scenarios.name: Legal Document - Very Hard

Source language: French
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: The contracting parties hereby agree to the terms and conditions stipulated herein, whereby any breach of contract shall result in immediate termination and potential legal ramifications.

scenarios.name: Historical Text - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "La Révolution industrielle a fondamentalement transformé la société, inaugurant une ère de progrès technologique et de changement social sans précédent qui continue d'influencer notre monde moderne."
scenarios.expected_output: The Industrial Revolution fundamentally transformed society, ushering in an era of unprecedented technological advancement and social change that continues to influence our modern world.

scenarios.name: Philosophical Quote - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: French
Target language: English
Text to translate: "La vie non examinée ne vaut pas la peine d'être vécue, car c'est à travers l'auto-réflexion et la contemplation que nous découvrons notre véritable but et sens dans l'existence."
scenarios.expected_output: The unexamined life is not worth living, for it is through self-reflection and contemplation that we discover our true purpose and meaning in existence.
